```{r}
# EXAMPLE OF HOW TO IMPORT AND PROCESS SD CARD DATA

library(data.table)  

data <- as.data.frame(fread("DATA_20240110.csv", fill = T))

# Extract device serial number from the data
deviceSN_value <- data %>%
    filter(V1 == "deviceSN") %>%
    pull(V2)

# Assuming your data frame is named 'data'
colnames(data) = data[4,]
data <- data[-(1:4), -70]  # Remove the first three rows and 70th column

# If you want to reset row indexes
rownames(data) <- NULL

# Remove the metadata rows
data_clean <- data %>%
  mutate(monitor = deviceSN_value)
```
